main.title: Intellectual help to the rescue
main.description: Мы даем возможность некоммерческим организациям бесплатно получить помощь специалистов из разных сфер, а волонтерам — применить свои знания и навыки ради доброго дела
We give NCOs an opportunity to get help from professional volunteers of different fields for free, and for volunteers - to use their skills and knowledge to do a good deed.
main.volunteerMotivation: You are a profession and want to do something good? Join the light side!
main.fundMotivation: Are you an NCO? Got unfinished business? Find your ProCharity superhero!
